msg: Your drummer <-drummer->, offers you some LSD.
Your manager <-manager->, tells you to smoke more weed, it will increase your creativity.
Your lover wants to share some blue pills.
You find your bassist's stash of joints.
Your friend, <-bff-> is going on an all-night pub crawl and wants you to come along.
Your manager <-manager->, is very happy about your progress and slips you a small bag of heroin.
After a long day of doing music-related stuff you settle down on your couch with a bottle of vodka.
You meet a couple of local fans in the park and they want to share some of their weed with you.
Your lover brought back a bag of smack and asks if you want to share it.
While cleaning, you find a green-looking pill under the rug..
Your bassist <-bassist->, comes by with a bottle of rum.
At a party you are offered some coke
<-bff-> comes around with a bag of snow
